sscharts

Class ScenarioConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • sscharts.ScenarioConfigurationReader

  • public class ScenarioConfigurationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads a scenario configuration file from a configuration JSON file. The class consists of many getters, an ASCII stdout print function, and a function to populate a UnitPool from the class's unit hash.

    Each method gives its own author. In some cases, I left Wayne Fuhrman as the main author even though I made changes to a few lines. The ground work was still laid by him.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScenarioConfigurationReader(java.lang.String configurationFileName)
      This constructor for ScenarioConfigurationReader is intended to read the configuration given by the specified file and use it to populate all fields of the class to reflect that data.
